Description:
Brand New Luxury Family Home
Land Size : 512sqm
Home Size : 27sq's approx
Built By : Simonds Homes
Location : Colverton Estate Kalkallo
If you appreciate purity of design and great home aesthetics then,this home is designed with you in mind.The use of clean lines inside and out, gives this home an uncluttered frontage and utterly roomy informal living space of approx 27sq. In this home the focus is on the open floor plan that prominently feature expansive windows, making them perfect for using natural light to illuminate the interior of the home.
Designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers. The Master comprising of a WIR'S and an en suite, remaining three large Bedrooms with built in robes, formal lounge, spacious open plan living area and a great kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, stone bench top & walk in pantry.
Luxury Inclusions Offered:
* European designed stainless steel appliances
* Evaporative Cooling
* Ducted Heating
* Down lights
* High Ceilings
* Formal Living Area
* Exposed Aggregate Driveway
* Alfresco Entertaining Area
* Double Garage with secure internal access
* Driveway & much more
Colverton Estate is perfect for nature lovers after a relaxed lifestyle. Proposed sporting facilities, cycling paths, parks and playgrounds will keep you feeling healthy and active.
Minutes from the existing Donnybrook Train Station and the future Train Station, access to the Melbourne CBD will be quick and easy. Cloverton has proposed community centres, state and private primary and secondary schools, childcare options as well as a proposed tertiary institution. You will feel proud to be a part of this Boutique Community and own a patch of this great Estate.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Brand New Family Home
Brand NEW home-in Kalkallo ready to move in
This spacious house ticks all the boxes, 4 bedrooms, Separate Living/Theatre Room....
You can live in this spectacular home, all that awaits is your furniture to make it a style of your own.
Imagine... you walk in your beautiful entrance to your Master Bedroom, there you find your Walk In Robe, your ensuite, shower, stone bench top and double vanity.
With an open plan kitchen, walk in pantry, stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel range hood and cooktop, stainless steel dishwasher, living area, perfect for those family gatherings, down the back of the house is the other 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, toilet, bathroom and laundry.
Located in the up-and-coming Kalkallo, close to future schools, shopping centres and Donnybrook train station
All this can be yours.. Make your dream of owning your own home come true.
. 4 Bedrooms
· 2 Bathrooms
· Double Remote-Control Garage
· Choice of Theatre Room/formal lounge
· Walk in Pantry
· 900mm Stainless Steel Rangehood
· 900mm stainless Steel Cooktop/Oven
· Stainless Steel Dishwasher
· Stone Benchtops throughout
· Ducted Heating
· Evaporative Cooling
· NBN Ready
What are you waiting for.??

Description:
Brand NEW,... All Done For You....
This Lavishly Stylish Home is what you have been looking for.
Right from the moment you set eyes inside the entrance, you know this is a stylish house waiting for a family to call it their home.
With 4 generous size bedrooms, Master with ensuite and walk in robe, 3 bedrooms with mirror sliding doors, shelving and draws inside the wardrobes.
A spectacular Kitchen with a huge walk-in pantry, 40mm stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, glass splashback, feature pendant lights, under benchtop sink and classy mixer tap,
An open plan kitchen, dining, living area ..which already has the built-in entertainment unit, with feature wall cut out, perfect for your flat screen wall mounted tv.
What more could you ask for .. !! A spectacular must see home.. with so many more extras
Stainless Steel Appliances,
Ducted heating,
Evaporative cooling,
Separate living area,
Bathrooms have floor to ceiling tiles & shower recess,
Quality porcelain tiles throughout,
Laundry with stone bench top and cupboards
Alarm,
Intercom,
Roller Blinds,
Double remote garage,
Aggregate stone driveway and paths
Concrete all-round the house.
NOW.. its Your choice...
Buy or Invest..
Whatever the decision.. make it
Call Lorraine 0405 311 879 Now and Inspect Today
* Take advantage of First Home Owners Grant
**Photos for illustration purposes only

Description:
BETTER THAN BRAND NEW
Swathes of natural light and abundant contemporary style define this beautifully presented family home. Set on a level 350m2 allotment amid stylish, low maintenance landscaping, this is a home that simply demands inspection.
The practical single level design showcases quality fixtures/fittings and a fresh neutral colour palette throughout 3 good-sized bedrooms with robes (master with ensuite and
walk-in robe), a cleverly zoned main bathroom,open study,rumpus room and spacious open-plan living/dining zone that links seamlessly to a covered alfresco zone. The gourmet kitchen hosts quality stainless steel appliances (900mm cooker),stone benchtops and sleek soft-close cabinetry--
what an inspiration !
The long list of extras includes a 6-star energy rating,solar electricity NBN connection,ducted heating/cooling, feature lighting, automated security shutters, remote controlled double garage and many quality upgrades. Ideally located between Donnybrook railway Station and Hume freeway,this stand-out property is within walking distance of the future shopping centre and schools. Inspect without delay.

Description:
BRAND NEW FAMILY HOME!!!!!!
Cloverton Estate will become a centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs.
Your Brand new Family home is under Construction now, and is waiting for you.
Surrounded with endless parkland, and miles of Merri Creek Trails for your enjoyment.
This Quality Built Modern Home is Designed to accommodate the demands of the astute buyer or growing families. Boasting a well-designed floor plan that features four spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, master with walk in robe and an en suite, second living area with a bulk head ceiling feature, large state of the art kitchen with high quality .Well thought out home design, where small inclusions offered make the biggest difference.This Home will provide you a maximum enjoyment with a free flowing open plan meals and living area, giving direct outdoor access to your covered alfresco area.
Luxury inclusions; 900mm stainless steel appliances, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, stone bench tops, alarm, Double car lockup garage with access to rear and much more...
